file_content.text: ...the house is gone, dismantled by the salvage droids.
I'm staying until I'm ash and bones, darling.
If it isn't my favorite ex-Intelligence agent. Retirement's keeping you busy.
The truth is, I'm glad you made it. We didn't have the chance to say goodbye.
You're hosting parties now.
This "celebration" is yours?
It's never "goodbye" between us. You know I'll follow you anywhere.
I couldn't stay away from you.
That's very good. I'm really glad you're here.
Dismantling Operations was the last mistake you'll ever make.
You've gone too far, Hunter.
You're sweet, but even I'm not perfect.
These people were Corellia's movers and shakers--the obscenely rich. My apocalypse party keeps them focused on themselves instead of doing anything constructive.
A good host attends in person.
You want them to sit back and enjoy the war?
You should've seen the Hesperidium resort during the Battle of Coruscant.
Your trap is wasteful and inefficient.
Is Kaliyo still on trial? She would've loved this party.
And yes, it's also an excuse to see the end of the world in style. No more Jedi, no more Sith--a new galaxy.
It'll be the same galaxy--you'll just have new enemies.
Delusions of grandeur.
Not once Corellia spirals out of control; the Republic and Empire will obliterate each other, and the Force-sensitive orders will go extinct.
What is your glorious vision for the future?
"A new galaxy"? Tell me.
The battle for Corellia spirals out of control; Republic and Empire obliterate each other and the Force-sensitive orders become dust.
For the first time in fourteen hundred years, ordinary people rule. No more getting caught in crusades or begging at temples for scraps.
No need to be afraid. Just one galaxy, united, at peace.
And the Star Cabal as its undisputed ruler?
United under your control.
We already control what's important. It's time to stop hiding.
No more Emperors or Jedi Councils. It would be something.
I agree with your cause.
Unfortunately, we don't take converts--security concerns. I was recruited at eleven, from a planet that doesn't exist anymore.
We could have been good together. That's why I'm sorry I have to question you.
People aren't tricked that easily. Particularly Jedi and Sith.
The war won't go your way.
They don't even see what's not related to the Force. We've reigned beneath their view for a long time.
You know you're the only person I can talk to about this? The others--they don't really chat like you and me.
That's why I'm sad it has to end.
What's that smell?
We can taste a foreign substance.
Sir? I don't feel quite right.
Is that the odor of coma gas?
A good dosage, too. Figured you wouldn't cooperate.
Soporific compounds are building in the air supply.
Coma gas. Figured you wouldn't cooperate.
Get down! There's no way out.
I'm flooding the air with coma gas. See you soon.
Nice plan, but I'm here and you're not. Maybe I should take a hostage. Maybe blow up your ship.
I'm ending your party now!
Maybe I'm not stupid. Your weapons have been disabled by a neutralizing field. I can vent coma gas at the touch of a button.
Too bad. I'd been hoping to chat.
Lock her up and prep her for interrogation.
Lock him up and prep him for interrogation.
You took something we wanted. Moff Zamar's report. Now we have questions.
Talk to Imperial Intelligence. They're good with answers.
I don't know anything.
I saw Zamar's data. I'll tell you everything I know.
Let me cooperate with you.
The numbers--they showed we were going to lose, so Lord Razer sent for reinforcements before he died. A fleet from the Auril Sector....
That was easy.
Check and see if she was lying.
Check and see if he was lying.
Yes, sir.
There's nothing you can do to me I haven't already suffered.
Show me what you've got.
You should've kept your brainwashing program. It'd be less painful.
Moff Zamar's report. What did it say, and who did you tell?
Agghhh!
Agent! We'll kill them--you and me!
Agent! Hang on. Someone will come....
Sir, they won't--ah!
Take her away, get ready for the next round.
Ha! Oh, I've--ha! I've done far worse than that to family....
Take him away, get ready for the next round.
That blasted droid just keeps watching me....
Get ready for the next round.
...high pain threshold. Lapsing in and out....
You said Lord Scourge sent for reinforcements?
Lord Razer. Please--I told you the truth.
We're not getting anything new. Tell the boss.
Look, we could do this forever. Ready to talk?
Moff Zamar's report--it showed we didn't have enough troops.
Reinforcements are on the way. A new fleet from the Auril Sector... led by a Sith Lord.
Tell the boss. Now.
Relax. Vacation's over, you get to check out.
Does that mean you're letting me go?
What happens now?
I kill you, the Empire gets suspicious--but there's a dangerous planet out there.
You could start running. Me, I'd start saying goodbye.
I've stayed here long enough.
Agreed. [Attack]
Ah! Blast it!
You want to wait a little longer next time? Let's move!
We didn't suffer like you did. Let's go.
I'm glad you're okay, sir. Let's go.
You put on a good show. Let's find some payback, shall we?
I saw you approach your threshold. Now I know what you can take.
[Feign unconsciousness]
Get a speeder prepped. We'll dump them in the park.
Get a speeder prepped. We'll dump her in the park.
Get a speeder prepped. We'll dump him in the park.
You sure?
Those are the orders. Murdering an Imperial officer draws suspicion--the boss has someone else to do that.
You don't look good. I don't feel good. But I think the scum bought it.
Move slowly. You did your job. You should be proud.
You were wonderful, sir. I think they believed you.
You won't feel quite right for a while, but I don't see any permanent damage. Good work.
Three hours and seventeen minutes longer, and you would have succumbed. Now I know.
Enjoying yourselves?
Is Doctor Lokin still in custody? He would've seen the possibilities here.
You and Temple still split? She knew how to have a good time.
Is Vector still gone? He'd have appreciated all this.
Where's the old SCORPIO droid? I'd like to see her try to mingle.
Yeah, you're way better than these losers.
...twelve drinks, three burning buildings and one beautiful woman. We will dedicate this evening to history!
...twelve drinks, three burning buildings and a ship full of beautiful women. We will dedicate this evening to history!
What the hell?
It's a masquerade gone mad.
What are they celebrating?
He certainly seems cheerful.
There are weapons here. They are concealed.
Welcome to the festivities. May I offer you a costume?
Who are all these people? What is this ship?
What's going on here?
This is the Apocalypse Barge. Our guests are the most important and influential people on Corellia, here to enjoy themselves one last time.
The war will see our planet ruined! And we will see the war from above!
As you can see, I must have forgotten mine.
Maybe later...
It's quite alright.
Please, enjoy the party.
I'm not in the mood to celebrate.
Out of my way.
That is unfortunate. Please try to enjoy the party.
Please enjoy your stay.
